required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of Comfort Behavior Levels of Newborns With Artificial Intelligence Techniques
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of Comfort Behavior Levels of Newborns With Artificial Intelligence Techniques

brief_summary.textblock: This study; It will be carried out with the aim of developing the artificial intelligence method, which allows automatic determination of comfort levels of newborns.

detailed_description.textblock: This study; It will be carried out with the aim of developing the artificial intelligence method, which allows automatic determination of comfort levels of newborns. Facial and body movements of newborns will be recorded by camera, and images will be processed in computer environment by using artificial intelligence techniques. As a result, it is planned to create a technology that determines the comfort level of the newborn quickly and simply and can be used by the mobile device.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: it is planned to create a technology that determines the comfort level of the newborn quickly and simply, easy to use, time-saving and can be used by the mobile device.
study_design_info.masking_description: Researchers and family of newborns will know about all the details of the study. Verbal and written permission will be obtained from families.

primary_outcome.description: Images will be taken to transfer behaviors of newborns to the computer. Attention will be paid to making face and body movements visible while taking the image.The camera will take 12 hours of view of each newborn.However, this period can be shortened as a result of preliminary work.

secondary_outcome.description: The images of the newborn will be transferred to the computer. The images will be processed by a specialist on computer using artificial intelligence techniques.

arm_group.description: Facial and body movements of newborns will be recorded by camera, and images will be processed in computer environment by using artificial intelligence techniques. As a result, it is planned to create a technology that determines the comfort level of the newborn quickly and simply and can be used by the mobile device.

intervention.description: it is planned to create a technology that determines the comfort level of the newborn quickly and simply, easy to use, time-saving and can be used by the mobile device.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Parents' acceptance of their baby's participation in the study
- Having a baby born at 24-42 weeks
Exclusion Criteria:
- Having a baby born before 24 weeks of gestation or after 42 weeks of gestation.
- Has received analgesic, muscle relaxant or sedative drug treatment that may affect comfort and behavior (last 24 hours)
- Newborn has serious neurological damage

overall_official.affiliation: ESKİŞEHİR OSMANGAZİ ÜNİVERSİTESİ SAĞLIK BİLİMLERİ FAKÜLTESİ

patient_data.ipd_description: At the end of the study, it is aimed to announce the artificial intelligence developed to measure comfort with the declaration to be made in international congresses. In this way, it is thought that the program will be used by healthcare professionals in different hospitals and neonatal clinics in these hospitals.
patient_data.ipd_time_frame: It will be shared after the study is finished (About 2 years later)
patient_data.ipd_access_criteria: Being a healthcare professional working with newborns
